verses.verse: And these<WH428> are the countries which<WH834> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> inherited<WH5157> in the land<WH776> of Canaan,<WH3667> which Eleazar<WH499> the priest,<WH3548> and Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun,<WH5126> and the heads<WH7218> of the fathers<WH1> of the tribes<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> distributed<WH5157> for inheritance<WH5157> to them.
By lot<WH1486> was their inheritance,<WH5159> as the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> by the hand<WH3027> of Moses,<WH4872> for the nine<WH8672> tribes,<WH4294> and for the half<WH2677> tribe.<WH4294>

For Moses<WH4872> had given<WH5414> the inheritance<WH5159> of two<WH8147> tribes<WH4294> and an half<WH2677> tribe<WH4294> on the other<WH5676> side<WH5676> Jordan:<WH3383> but to the Levites<WH3881> he gave<WH5414> none<WH3808> inheritance<WH5159> among<WH8432> them.

For the children<WH1121> of Joseph<WH3130> were two<WH8147> tribes,<WH4294> Manasseh<WH4519> and Ephraim:<WH669> therefore they gave<WH5414> no<WH3808> part<WH2506> to the Levites<WH3881> in the land,<WH776> save<WH3588> <WH518> cities<WH5892> to dwell<WH3427> in, with their suburbs<WH4054> for their cattle<WH4735> and for their substance.<WH7075>
As the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses,<WH4872> so<WH3651> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did,<WH6213> and they divided<WH2505> the land.<WH776>

Then the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> came<WH5066> to Joshua<WH3091> in Gilgal:<WH1537> and Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Jephunneh<WH3312> the Kenezite<WH7074> said<WH559> to him, You know<WH3045> the thing<WH1697> that the LORD<WH3068> said<WH1696> to Moses<WH4872> the man<WH376> of God<WH430> concerning<WH5921> <WH182> me and you in Kadeshbarnea.<WH6947>

Forty<WH705> years<WH8141> old<WH1121> was I when Moses<WH4872> the servant<WH5650> of the LORD<WH3068> sent<WH7971> me from Kadeshbarnea<WH6947> to espy<WH7270> out the land;<WH776> and I brought<WH7725> him word<WH1697> again<WH7725> as it was in my heart.<WH3824>
Nevertheless my brothers<WH251> that went<WH5927> up with me made the heart<WH3820> of the people<WH5971> melt:<WH4529> but I wholly<WH4390> followed<WH310> the LORD<WH3068> my God.<WH430>

And Moses<WH4872> swore<WH7650> on that day,<WH3117> saying,<WH559> Surely<WH518> the land<WH776> where on<WH834> your feet<WH7272> have trodden<WH1869> shall be your inheritance,<WH5159> and your children's<WH1121> for ever,<WH5769> because<WH3588> you have wholly<WH4390> followed<WH310> the LORD<WH3068> my God.<WH430>

And now,<WH6258> behold,<WH2009> the LORD<WH3068> has kept me alive,<WH2421> as he said,<WH1696> these<WH2088> forty<WH705> and five<WH2568> years,<WH8141> even since<WH227> the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> this<WH2088> word<WH1697> to Moses,<WH4872> while<WH834> the children of Israel<WH3478> wandered<WH1980> in the wilderness:<WH4057> and now,<WH6258> see,<WH2009> I am this day<WH3117> fourscore<WH8084> and five<WH2568> years<WH8141> old.<WH1121>

As yet<WH5750> I am as strong<WH2389> this day<WH3117> as I was in the day<WH3117> that Moses<WH4872> sent<WH7971> me: as my strength<WH3581> was then,<WH227> even so is my strength<WH3581> now,<WH6258> for war,<WH4421> both to go<WH3318> out, and to come<WH935> in.

Now<WH6258> therefore give<WH5414> me this<WH2088> mountain,<WH2022> whereof<WH834> the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> in that day;<WH3117> for you heard<WH8085> in that day<WH3117> how<WH3588> the Anakims<WH6062> were there,<WH8033> and that the cities<WH5892> were great<WH1419> and fenced:<WH1219> if<WH194> so be the LORD<WH3068> will be with me, then I shall be able to drive<WH3423> them out, as the LORD<WH3068> said.<WH1696>
And Joshua<WH3091> blessed<WH1288> him, and gave<WH5414> to Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Jephunneh<WH3312> Hebron<WH2275> for an inheritance.<WH5159>

Hebron<WH2275> therefore became<WH1961> the inheritance<WH5159> of Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Jephunneh<WH3312> the Kenezite<WH7074> to this<WH2088> day,<WH3117> because<WH3282> that he wholly<WH4390> followed<WH310> the LORD<WH3068> God<WH430> of Israel.<WH3478>

And the name<WH8034> of Hebron<WH2275> before<WH6440> was Kirjatharba;<WH7153> which Arba was a great<WH1419> man<WH120> among the Anakims.<WH6062> And the land<WH776> had rest<WH8252> from war.<WH4421>
